question: [Brief] Portugues: Calcule area e perimetro do poligono com vertices (84, 199), (153, 116), (131, 50), (193, 131).

qas.question: [Brief] Portugues: Calcule area e perimetro do poligono com vertices (84, 199), (153, 116), (131, 50), (193, 131).
